bike.description: Stumpjumper FSR M5 manipulated alloy 29er frame, tapered integrated HT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 130mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox AFR Brain Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, rebound adj. and Brain Fade, 7.875x1.8" Integrated cartridge bearing shock mount.
Fox F29RL, 120mm, compression and rebound adj. w/ LO, tapered steerer, 15mm thru axle
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower cartridge bearing
3D forged alloy, adjustable rise, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized XC flat, 2014 butted alloy, 680mm wide, 8 degree backsweep,
Specialized waffle lock on grip (M) Specialized Thick lock on grip (L/XL)
Custom Avid Elixir CR SL, alloy backed semi-met pads, alloy Elixir CR lever w/ pad contact and reach adj, S/M: 185mm, L/XL: 203mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir CR SL, alloy backed semi-met pads, alloy Elixir CR lever w/ pad contact and reach adj, S/M: 160mm, L/XL: 185mm rotor
Custom Avid Elixir CR SL Hydraulic, carbon lever blade, tool-less adj. reach and pad contact
Shimano M660 SLX, DMD, top swing, dual pull
SRAM X-0, 9-speed, long cage
SRAM X-9 aluminum trigger
Shimano HG61, 9-speed, 12-36t
SRAM PC-971, 9-speed w/Power Link
Custom Shimano FC-M762 XT, 2pc., 175mm
Custom Shimano integrated
Custom DT Swiss 520SL, 29", 26mm wide, sleeved w/eyelets, 32h
Hi Lo disc, CNC flange, sealed cartridge bearing, 15mm DT RWS, alloy QR, 32h
Custom DT Swiss 330SL w/ alloy freehub, DT RWS QR, 32h
DT Swiss Competition 1.8/1.6mm stainless
S-Works Eskar, 29x2.3", 120 TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead, dual compound
Specialized The Captain Control, 29x2.0", 60 TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead, dual compound
Ultralight presta valve
Specialized Format, hollow Cr-Mo rails, SL foam, M: 130mm L/XXL:143mm
2014 butted alloy, single bolt setback, 30.9mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
